Task Description: Create a PHP class for making HTTP requests using cURL with support for various HTTP methods, streaming, authentication, and proxy configuration.

Class Description: The RequestCore class provides a comprehensive wrapper around PHP's cURL functions to simplify HTTP requests. It supports GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, and HEAD methods, handles authentication, manages request/response headers and bodies, supports streaming for large files, and includes proxy configuration.

Attributes:
- request_url: string - The URL to send the request to
- request_headers: array - Associative array of request headers
- request_body: string - The request body content
- response: string - The complete response from the server
- response_headers: array - Parsed response headers
- response_body: string - The response body content
- response_code: int - HTTP response status code
- response_info: array - Additional cURL response information
- curl_handle: resource - The cURL handle resource
- method: string - HTTP method (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, HEAD)
- proxy: array|null - Proxy configuration details
- username: string|null - Authentication username
- password: string|null - Authentication password
- curlopts: array|null - Additional cURL options
- debug_mode: bool - Whether to enable debug mode
- request_class: string - Class name for request objects
- response_class: string - Class name for response objects
- useragent: string - User agent string
- read_file: string|null - File path for reading data
- read_stream: resource|null - Stream resource for reading data
- read_stream_size: int|null - Size of read stream
- read_stream_read: int - Bytes read from stream
- write_file: string|null - File path for writing data
- write_stream: resource|null - Stream resource for writing data
- seek_position: int|null - Position to seek in read stream
- cacert_location: mixed - CA certificate location
- ssl_verification: bool - Whether to verify SSL
- registered_streaming_read_callback: callable|null - Callback for streaming read
- registered_streaming_write_callback: callable|null - Callback for streaming write

Methods:
- __construct(string|null $url, array|null $proxy, array|null $helpers) -> self - Initialize the request object
- __destruct() -> self - Clean up resources
- set_credentials(string $user, string $pass) -> self - Set authentication credentials
- add_header(string $key, string $value) -> self - Add a request header
- remove_header(string $key) -> self - Remove a request header
- set_method(string $method) -> self - Set the HTTP method
- set_useragent(string $ua) -> self - Set the user agent
- set_body(string $body) -> self - Set the request body
- set_request_url(string $url) -> self - Set the request URL
- set_curlopts(array $curlopts) -> self - Set additional cURL options
- set_read_stream_size(int $size) -> self - Set read stream size
- set_read_stream(resource $resource, int|null $size) -> self - Set read stream resource
- set_read_file(string $location) -> self - Set read file location
- set_write_stream(resource $resource) -> self - Set write stream resource
- set_write_file(string $location) -> self - Set write file location
- set_proxy(string $proxy) -> self - Configure proxy settings
- set_seek_position(int|null $position) -> self - Set seek position for read stream
- register_streaming_read_callback(callable $callback) -> self - Register read callback
- register_streaming_write_callback(callable $callback) -> self - Register write callback
- streaming_read_callback(resource $curl_handle, resource $file_handle, int $length) -> string - Handle streaming read
- streaming_write_callback(resource $curl_handle, string $data) -> int - Handle streaming write
- prep_request() -> resource - Prepare and return cURL handle
- process_response(resource|null $curl_handle, string|null $response) -> mixed - Process the response
- send_request(bool $parse = false) -> mixed - Send the request and get response
- get_response_header(string|null $header) -> mixed - Get response header(s)
- get_response_body() -> string - Get response body
- get_response_code() -> int - Get response status code

    }

        return $this;
    }

    public function register_streaming_read_callback(callable $callback) {
        $this->registered_streaming_read_callback = $callback;
        return $this;
    }

    public function register_streaming_write_callback(callable $callback) {
        $this->registered_streaming_write_callback = $callback;
        return $this;
    }

    public function streaming_read_callback(resource $curl_handle, resource $file_handle, int $length) {
        return fread($file_handle, $length);
    }

    public function streaming_write_callback(resource $curl_handle, string $data) {
        return fwrite($curl_handle, $data);
    }

    public function prep_request() {
        $this->curl_handle = curl_init();
        curl_setopt_array($this->curl_handle, $this->curlopts);

        if ($this->proxy) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_PROXY, $this->proxy['host'] . ':' . $this->proxy['port']);
            if (isset($this->proxy['user'])) {
                curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_PROXYUSERPWD, $this->proxy['user'] . ':' . $this->proxy['pass']);
            }
        }

        if ($this->username && $this->password) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_USERPWD, $this->username . ':' . $this->password);
        }

        if ($this->method === 'HEAD') {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_NOBODY, true);
        }

        if ($this->read_file) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_READFUNCTION, function($ch, $string) {
                return fread(fopen($this->read_file, 'r'), strlen($string));
            });
        } elseif ($this->read_stream) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_READFUNCTION, function($ch, $string) {
                return fread($this->read_stream, strlen($string));
            });
        }

        if ($this->write_file) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, function($ch, $string) {
                return fwrite($this->write_file, $string);
            });
        } elseif ($this->write_stream) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, function($ch, $string) {
                return fwrite($this->write_stream, $string);
            });
        }

        if ($this->read_stream_size) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDSIZE, $this->read_stream_size);
        }

        if ($this->seek_position !== null) {
            fseek($this->read_stream, $this->seek_position);
        }

        if ($this->cacert_location) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_CAINFO, $this->cacert_location);
        }

        if (!$this->ssl_verification) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER, false);
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYHOST, false);
        }

        if ($this->debug_mode) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_VERBOSE, true);
        }

        curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_URL, $this->request_url);
        curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $this->request_headers);
        curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_HEADER, true);
        curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, true);
        curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT, 30);
        curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS, 10);
        curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_ENCODING, '');
        curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER, $this->ssl_verification);
        curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYHOST, $this->ssl_verification ? 2 : 0);
        curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION, CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1);

        if ($this->method === 'POST' || $this->method === 'PUT') {
            if ($this->request_body) {
                curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $this->request_body);
            }
        }

        return $this->curl_handle;
    }

    public function process_response(resource $curl_handle, string $response) {
        $this->response = $response;
        $this->response_code = curl_getinfo($curl_handle, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);
        $this->response_info = curl_getinfo($curl_handle);
        $this->response_headers = [];

        $header_size = curl_getinfo($curl_handle, CURLINFO_HEADER_SIZE);
        $headers = substr($response, 0, $header_size);
        $body = substr($response, $header_size);

        foreach (explode("\r\n", $headers) as $header) {
            if (strlen(trim($header)) > 0) {
                list($key, $value) = explode(':', $header, 2);
                $this->response_headers[$key] = $value;
            }
        }

        $this->response_body = $body;
        return $this;
    }

    public function send_request(bool $parse = false) {
        $this->prep_request();

        if ($this->registered_streaming_read_callback) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_READFUNCTION, $this->registered_streaming_read_callback);
        }

        if ($this->registered_streaming_write_callback) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, $this->registered_streaming_write_callback);
        }

        if ($this->method === 'POST' || $this->method === 'PUT') {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $this->request_body);
        }

        if ($this->read_file) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_READFUNCTION, function($ch, $string) {
                return fread(fopen($this->read_file, 'r'), strlen($string));
            });
        } elseif ($this->read_stream) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_READFUNCTION, function($ch, $string) {
                return fread($this->read_stream, strlen($string));
            });
        }

        if ($this->write_file) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, function($ch, $string) {
                return fwrite($this->write_file, $string);
            });
        } elseif ($this->write_stream) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, function($ch, $string) {
                return fwrite($this->write_stream, $string);
            });
        }

        $this->process_response($this->curl_handle, curl_exec($this->curl_handle));

        if ($parse) {
            return new $this->response_class($this->response_code, $this->response_headers, $this->response_body);
        }

        return $this->response;
    }

    public function get_response_header(string $header = null) {
        if ($header === null) {
            return $this->response_headers;
        }

        return isset($this->response_headers[$header]) ? $this->response_headers[$header] : null;
    }

    public function get_response_body() {
        return $this->response_body;
    }

    public function get_response_code() {
        return $this->response_code;
    }
}

<?php

use GuzzleHttp\Client;
use GuzzleHttp\Exception\RequestException;
use Psr\Http\Message\ResponseInterface;

class Pretreat
{
    private $config;
    private $client;

    public function __construct(Config $config)
    {
        if (empty($config->processNotifyUrl)) {
            throw new Exception("processNotifyUrl is not configured");
        }

        $this->config = $config;
        $this->client = new Client([
            'base_uri' => $config->endpoint,
            'timeout' => $config->timeout
        ]);
    }

    public function process(array $tasks, array $optionalParams = [])
    {
        $url = $this->config->processUrl;
        $data = [
            'tasks' => $tasks,
            'optionalParams' => $optionalParams
        ];

        try {
            $response = $this->client->post($url, ['json' => $data]);
            $body = json_decode($response->getBody(), true);

            if ($response->getStatusCode() === 200 && isset($body['result']) && $body['result'] === 'success') {
                return $body;
            } else {
                return [];
            }
        } catch (RequestException $e) {
            return [];
        }
    }

    public function query(array $taskIds, string $path)
    {
        $url = $this->config->queryUrl . '/' . $path;
        $data = ['taskIds' => $taskIds];

        try {
            $response = $this->client->post($url, ['json' => $data]);
            $body = json_decode($response->getBody(), true);

            if ($response->getStatusCode() === 200 && isset($body['result']) && $body['result'] === 'success') {
                return $body['data'] ?? [];
            } else {
                return false;
            }
        } catch (RequestException $e) {
            return false;
        }
    }
}

- handle(CurrencyRepository $currencyRepository, ConversionRateRepository $conversionRateRepository) -> void - Main method that executes the conversion rate fetching process:

<?php

namespace App;

use GuzzleHttp\Client;
use GuzzleHttp\Exception\RequestException;
use App\Repository\CurrencyRepository;
use App\Repository\ConversionRateRepository;

class FetchConversionRate
{
    private int $baseCurrencyId;
    private CurrencyRepository $currencyRepository;
    private ConversionRateRepository $conversionRateRepository;

    public function __construct(int $baseCurrencyId)
    {
        $this->baseCurrencyId = $baseCurrencyId;
    }

    public function handle(CurrencyRepository $currencyRepository, ConversionRateRepository $conversionRateRepository): void
    {
        $this->currencyRepository = $currencyRepository;
        $this->conversionRateRepository = $conversionRateRepository;

        try {
            $currencies = $this->currencyRepository->getAll();
            $client = new Client();

            foreach ($currencies as $currency) {
                if ($currency->getId() === $this->baseCurrencyId) {
                    continue;
                }

                try {
                    $response = $client->get("https://api.exchangerate-api.com/v4/latest/{$this->baseCurrencyId}", [
                        'headers' => ['Accept' => 'application/json']
                    ]);

                    $data = json_decode($response->getBody(), true);

                    if (isset($data['rates'][$currency->getId()])) {
                        $conversionRate = $data['rates'][$currency->getId()];
                        $this->conversionRateRepository->save($this->baseCurrencyId, $currency->getId(), $conversionRate);
                    }
                } catch (RequestException $e) {
                    // Handle API request failure
                    error_log("Failed to fetch conversion rate for currency {$currency->getId()}: " . $e->getMessage());
                }
            }
        } catch (\Exception $e) {
            // Handle other exceptions
            error_log("Error in conversion rate fetching process: " . $e->getMessage());
        }
    }
}

<?php

namespace GuzzleClient;

class Guzzle
{

    protected $responseClientError;

    protected $client;

    public function __construct(GuzzleClient $client = null, array $config = [])
    {

        $this->requestArguments = [];

        $this->responseBody = '';
        $this->responseHeader = [];
        $this->responseHttpCode = 0;
        $this->responseClientError = null;

    public function request(string $uri, string $method, array $parameters, array $headers, bool $multipart): string

            'headers' => $headers

        try {

                    'status_code' => $response->getStatusCode(),
                    'body' => $this->responseBody

            return $this->responseBody;
        } catch (RequestException $e) {

                'code' => $e->getCode(),

            if ($this->logger) {

                    'exception' => get_class($e),

                    'code' => $e->getCode(),
                    'request' => $e->getRequest()
                ]);

            return '';

<?php
class requests {
    const VERSION = '1.0';

    protected $ch = null;
    protected $timeout = 30;
    protected $encoding = null;
    protected $output_encoding = null;
    protected $cookies = array();
    protected $rawheaders = array();
    protected $domain_cookies = array();
    protected $headers = array();
    protected $useragents = array('Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36');
    protected $client_ips = array();
    protected $proxies = array();
    protected $raw = '';
    protected $head = '';
    protected $content = '';
    protected $text = '';
    protected $info = array();
    protected $history = 0;
    protected $status_code = 0;
    protected $error = '';

    public function init() {
        $this->ch = curl_init();
        curl_setopt($this->ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        curl_setopt($this->ch, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, true);
        curl_setopt($this->ch, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT, $this->timeout);
        return $this->ch;
    }

    public function request($url, $method = 'GET', $fields = array(), $files = array(), $allow_redirects = true, $cert = NULL) {
        if (!$this->ch) {
            $this->init();
        }

        if (!$this->_is_url($url)) {
            $this->error = "Invalid URL: $url";
            return false;
        }

        curl_setopt($this->ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
        curl_setopt($this->ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, $method);

        if ($method === 'POST') {
            curl_setopt($this->ch, CURLOPT_POST, true);
            curl_setopt($this->ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, http_build_query($fields));
        } elseif ($method === 'PUT') {
            curl_setopt($this->ch, CURLOPT_PUT, true);
            curl_setopt($this->ch, CURLOPT_INFILESIZE, strlen($fields));
            curl_setopt($this->ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $fields);
        } elseif ($method === 'PATCH') {
            curl_setopt($this->ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'PATCH');
            curl_setopt($this->ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $fields);
        } elseif ($method === 'DELETE') {
            curl_setopt($this->ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'DELETE');
            curl_setopt($this->ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $fields);
        }

        if (!empty($files)) {
            curl_setopt($this->ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $files);
        }

        if ($allow_redirects) {
            curl_setopt($this->ch, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, true);
        } else {
            curl_setopt($this->ch, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, false);
        }

        if ($cert) {
            curl_setopt($this->ch, CURLOPT_SSLCERT, $cert);
        }

        $this->raw = curl_exec($this->ch);
        $this->info = curl_getinfo($this->ch);
        $this->status_code = $this->info['http_code'];
        $this->history = $this->info['redirect_count'];

        if ($this->raw === false) {
            $this->error = curl_error($this->ch);
            return false;
        }

        list($this->head, $this->content) = $this->split_header_body();

        $this->text = mb_convert_encoding($this->content, $this->output_encoding ?: 'UTF-8', 'UTF-8');

        return $this->text;
    }

    protected function _is_url($url) {
        return filter_var($url, FILTER_VALIDATE_URL) !== false;
    }

    public function get_cookies($domain = '') {
        return $domain ? $this->domain_cookies[$domain] : $this->cookies;
    }

    public function get_response_headers($header) {
        return $this->headers[$header];
    }

    public function get_response_cookies($header, $domain) {
        $this->get_response_headers($header);
        $this->domain_cookies[$domain] = $this->parse_cookies($header);
    }

    protected function parse_cookies($header) {
        $cookies = array();
        $lines = explode("\r\n", $header);
        foreach ($lines as $line) {
            if (strpos($line, 'Set-Cookie:') === 0) {
                $cookie = str_replace('Set-Cookie:', '', $line);
                $cookie = trim($cookie);
                $parts = explode('; ', $cookie);
                $name = $parts[0];
                $value = isset($parts[1]) ? $parts[1] : '';
                $cookies[$name] = $value;
            }
        }
        return $cookies;
    }

    protected function split_header_body() {
        $headers = '';
        $body = '';
        $header_end = strpos($this->raw, "\r\n\r\n");
        if ($header_end === false) {
            $headers = $this->raw;
            $body = '';
        } else {
            $headers = substr($this->raw, 0, $header_end);
            $body = substr($this->raw, $header_end + 4);
        }
        return array($headers, $body);
    }

    public function get_history($header) {
        return $this->info['redirect_count'];
    }

    public function get_mimetype($filepath) {
        $finfo = finfo_open(FILEINFO_MIME);
        $mimetype = finfo_file($finfo, $filepath);
        finfo_close($finfo);
        return $mimetype;
    }
}

    public function prepRequest() {

        curl_setopt_array($this->curl_handle, [
            CURLOPT_URL => $this->request_url,
            CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
            CURLOPT_HEADER => true,
            CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true,
            CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
            CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
            CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER => false,
            CURLOPT_USERAGENT => $this->useragent
        ]);

        if ($this->proxy) {
            curl_setopt_array($this->curl_handle, [
                CURLOPT_PROXY => $this->proxy['host'],
                CURLOPT_PROXYPORT => $this->proxy['port'],
                CURLOPT_PROXYUSERPWD => $this->username . ':' . $this->password
            ]);
        }

        if ($this->method === 'POST' || $this->method === 'PUT') {
            curl_setopt_array($this->curl_handle, [
                CURLOPT_POST => true,
                CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => $this->request_body
            ]);
        } elseif ($this->method === 'GET') {
            curl_setopt_array($this->curl_handle, [
                CURLOPT_HTTPGET => true
            ]);
        } elseif ($this->method === 'DELETE') {
            curl_setopt_array($this->curl_handle, [
                CURLOPT_DELETE => true
            ]);
        } elseif ($this->method === 'HEAD') {
            curl_setopt_array($this->curl_handle, [
                CURLOPT_NOBODY => true
            ]);
        }

        if ($this->curlopts) {
            foreach ($this->curlopts as $key => $value) {
                curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, $key, $value);
            }
        }

        if ($this->registered_streaming_read_callback) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_READFUNCTION, $this->registered_streaming_read_callback);
        }

        if ($this->registered_streaming_write_callback) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, $this->registered_streaming_write_callback);
        }

        return $this->curl_handle;
    }

    public function sendRequest($parse = false) {
        $this->prepRequest();
        $this->processResponse($this->curl_handle);
        if ($parse) {
            return $this->getResponse();
        }
        return $this->response;
    }

    public function processResponse($curl_handle = null, $response = null) {
        if (!$curl_handle) {
            $curl_handle = $this->curl_handle;
        }

        if ($response === null) {
            $this->response = curl_exec($curl_handle);
        } else {
            $this->response = $response;
        }

        $this->response_code = curl_getinfo($curl_handle, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);
        $this->response_info = curl_getinfo($curl_handle);

        $header_size = curl_getinfo($curl_handle, CURLINFO_HEADER_SIZE);
        $headers = substr($this->response, 0, $header_size);
        $body = substr($this->response, $header_size);

        $this->response_headers = $this->parseHeaders($headers);
        $this->response_body = $body;

        return $this->response_body;
    }

    private function parseHeaders($headers) {
        $headers_array = [];
        $lines = explode("\r\n", $headers);
        foreach ($lines as $line) {
            if (trim($line) === '') continue;
            list($name, $value) = explode(':', $line, 2);
            $headers_array[$name] = $value;
        }
        return $headers_array;
    }

    public function isBaeEnv() {
        return defined('BAE_ENV') && BAE_ENV === true;
    }

    public function getResponseHeader($header = null) {
        if ($header === null) {
            return $this->response_headers;
        }
        return isset($this->response_headers[$header]) ? $this->response_headers[$header] : null;
    }

    public function getResponseBody() {
        return $this->response_body;
    }

    public function getResponseCode() {
        return $this->response_code;
    }
}

- response([string $text]) -> [array] - Parses the JSON response from BCS into an array
- error([string $header]) -> [void] - Processes error responses from BCS and sets the error message

The request method specifically handles:

wrong_result:
<?php
class Bcs {
    public $rootPath;
    public $error;
    public $config;
    public $bcs;

    public function __construct(array $config = []) {
        $this->config = [
            'access_key' => '',
            'secret_key' => '',
            'bucket' => '',
            'rename' => false,
            'timeout' => 30
        ];
        if (!empty($config)) {
            $this->config = array_merge($this->config, $config);
        }
        $this->rootPath = $this->config['bucket'] . '/';
        $this->error = '';
        $this->bcs = new BaiduBCS();
    }

    public function request($path, $method, $headers = null, $body = null) {
        $url = 'https://bcscdn.bcebos.com/' . $this->rootPath . $path;
        $ch = curl_init();
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT, $this->config['timeout']);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headers);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, $method);
        if ($body !== null) {
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, json_encode($body));
        }
        $response = curl_exec($ch);
        $http_code = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);
        $this->error = '';
        if ($http_code >= 400) {
            $this->error = 'HTTP error: ' . $http_code;
            return false;
        }
        if (strpos($response, 'Error') !== false) {
            $this->error = 'BCS error: ' . $response;
            return false;
        }
        return json_decode($response, true);
    }

    public function response($text) {
        return json_decode($text, true);
    }

    public function error($header) {
        if (isset($header['x-bce-error-code'])) {
            $this->error = 'BCS error code: ' . $header['x-bce-error-code'];
        } else {
            $this->error = 'Unknown error';
        }
    }
}
?>

namespace Upyun;

        $this->config = $config;
        $this->client = new Client([
            'base_uri' => $config->getEndpoint(),
            'timeout' => $config->getTimeout()
        ]);
    }

    public function process(array $params, string $path): array

        try {

            return json_decode($body, true);

    }

        // Implement request signing logic here based on your API's requirements

        return $params;
    }
}

<?php
class BackendService {
    private $backendUrl;
    private $backendToken;

    public function addTask(string $id): array {
        return $this->setCurl($this->backendUrl . '/tasks', 'POST', json_encode(['id' => $id]), 'application/json');
    }

    public function restartTask(string $id): array {
        return $this->setCurl($this->backendUrl . '/tasks/' . $id . '/restart', 'POST', json_encode(['id' => $id]), 'application/json');
    }

    public function removeTask(string $id): array {
        return $this->setCurl($this->backendUrl . '/tasks/' . $id, 'DELETE');
    }

    private function setCurl(string $backendUrl, string $operation, string $data = null, string $contentType = 'application/json'): array {
        $ch = curl_init();

        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $backendUrl);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, [
            'Authorization: Bearer ' . $this->backendToken,
            'Content-Type: ' . $contentType
        ]);

        if ($data !== null) {
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, true);
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $data);
        }

        $response = curl_exec($ch);

        if (curl_errno($ch)) {
            return ['status' => 'error', 'message' => 'cURL error: ' . curl_error($ch)];
        }

        $httpCode = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);

        if ($httpCode >= 400) {
            return ['status' => 'error', 'message' => 'HTTP error: ' . $httpCode];
        }

        $responseData = json_decode($response, true);

        return ['status' => 'success', 'message' => $responseData ? $responseData['message'] : 'Operation successful'];
    }
}

Task Description: Create a PHP class for handling HTTP requests using cURL with support for various HTTP methods, streaming, authentication, and proxy configuration.

Class Description: BCS_RequestCore is a comprehensive HTTP client class that provides a flexible interface for making HTTP requests using PHP's cURL extension. It supports all major HTTP methods (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, HEAD), handles authentication, proxy configuration, streaming uploads/downloads, and provides detailed response information.

Attributes:

request_url: [string] - The URL to send the request to
request_headers: [array] - Associative array of request headers
request_body: [string] - The request body content
response: [string] - The complete response from the server
response_headers: [array] - Parsed response headers
response_body: [string] - The response body content
response_code: [int] - HTTP response status code
response_info: [array] - Additional response information from cURL
curl_handle: [resource] - The cURL handle resource
method: [string] - HTTP method (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, HEAD)
proxy: [array|null] - Proxy configuration details
username: [string|null] - Username for authentication
password: [string|null] - Password for authentication
curlopts: [array|null] - Additional cURL options
debug_mode: [bool] - Whether to enable debug mode
request_class: [string] - Class name for request handling
response_class: [string] - Class name for response handling
useragent: [string] - User agent string
read_file: [string|null] - File path for streaming upload
read_stream: [resource|null] - Stream resource for reading
read_stream_size: [int|null] - Size of the read stream
read_stream_read: [int] - Bytes read from the stream
write_file: [string|null] - File path for streaming download
write_stream: [resource|null] - Stream resource for writing
seek_position: [int|null] - Position to seek in the read stream
registered_streaming_read_callback: [callable|null] - Callback for streaming read
registered_streaming_write_callback: [callable|null] - Callback for streaming write

Methods:

__construct([string|null] $url, [array|null] $proxy, [array|null] $helpers) -> [self] - Initializes the request object with optional URL, proxy, and helper classes
__destruct() -> [self] - Cleans up any open file handles
set_credentials([string] $user, [string] $pass) -> [self] - Sets authentication credentials
add_header([string] $key, [string] $value) -> [self] - Adds a request header
remove_header([string] $key) -> [self] - Removes a request header
set_method([string] $method) -> [self] - Sets the HTTP method
set_useragent([string] $ua) -> [self] - Sets the user agent string
set_body([string] $body) -> [self] - Sets the request body
set_request_url([string] $url) -> [self] - Sets the request URL
set_curlopts([array] $curlopts) -> [self] - Sets additional cURL options
set_read_stream_size([int] $size) -> [self] - Sets the read stream size
set_read_stream([resource] $resource, [int|null] $size) -> [self] - Sets the read stream resource
set_read_file([string] $location) -> [self] - Sets a file to read from
set_write_stream([resource] $resource) -> [self] - Sets the write stream resource
set_write_file([string] $location) -> [self] - Sets a file to write to
set_proxy([string] $proxy) -> [self] - Configures proxy settings
set_seek_position([int|null] $position) -> [self] - Sets the seek position for read stream
register_streaming_read_callback([callable] $callback) -> [self] - Registers a streaming read callback
register_streaming_write_callback([callable] $callback) -> [self] - Registers a streaming write callback
streaming_read_callback([resource] $curl_handle, [resource] $file_handle, [int] $length) -> [string] - Callback for reading from stream
streaming_write_callback([resource] $curl_handle, [string] $data) -> [int] - Callback for writing to stream
prep_request() -> [resource] - Prepares and returns a cURL handle
process_response([resource|null] $curl_handle, [string|null] $response) -> [mixed] - Processes the cURL response
send_request([bool] $parse) -> [mixed] - Sends the request and returns response
isBaeEnv() -> [bool] - Checks if running in Baidu App Engine environment
get_response_header([string|null] $header) -> [mixed] - Gets response header(s)
get_response_body() -> [string] - Gets the response body
get_response_code() -> [int] - Gets the response status code
